function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of comprehensive ranking of all identified actions and their impacts","Impact":"Inability to develop an effective response plan for controlling and mitigating the effects of the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Conducting repeated data collection during several stages of the COVID-19 pandemic to gather more comprehensive data","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, survey instruments","People":"Construction organizations","Owner":"Research team or experts in the field"},{"Description":"Rapidly changing COVID-19 pandemic situation","Impact":"Difficulty in developing a timely response plan for construction organizations","Mitigation":"Continuously monitoring the evolving situation and adapting the response plan accordingly","Technologies":"Monitoring tools, data analytics software","People":"Construction organizations, public health authorities","Owner":"Research team or experts in the field"},{"Description":"Reliance on preliminary data for decision-making","Impact":"Risk of developing recommendations based on incomplete or inaccurate data","Mitigation":"Repeating data collection at multiple stages of the pandemic to ensure the accuracy and comprehensiveness of the data","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Research team, construction organizations","Owner":"Research team or experts in the field"}]}
